facts.seriesTitle: Renewable energy share in the total final energy consumption (percent)
facts.fact_text: The share of renewable energy in the total final energy consumption increased from 1.4 % in 2000 to 4.9% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Protected marine area (Exclusive Economic Zones) (square kilometres)
facts.fact_text: The extension of protected marine area was 39587.8 km2 in 2018.

facts.seriesTitle: Coverage of protected areas in relation to marine areas (Exclusive Economic Zones) (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2018, 7.2 % of the marine environment under national jurisdiction (up to 200 nautical miles from shore) was under protection.

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of Marine Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (percent)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of Marine Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas increased from 9.4 % in 2000 to 10.4% in 2019.

facts.seriesTitle: Fixed Internet broadband subscriptions (per 100 inhabitants)
facts.fact_text: Fixed-broadband internet penetration reached increased from 10.9 per 100 inhabitants in 2006 to 32.6 per 100 inhabitants in 2017.

facts.fact_text: The number of inernet users per 100 inhabitants increased from 58.6 in 2000 to 99.0 in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Average tariff applied by developed countries, most-favored nation status (percent)
facts.fact_text: The average most-favored nation status tariff applied by developed countries increased from 3.3 % in 2000 to 3.5% in 2018.

facts.seriesTitle: Average tariff applied by developed countries, preferential status (percent)
facts.fact_text: The average preferential status tariff applied by developed countries declined from 2.5 % in 2000 to 1.1% in 2018.
